name: Config Recap Presentation
description:
It's a presentation I put together after attending Config. Did not get to every single talk but I organized my notes for the ones I went to! 

In the end I attached some slides/Twitter thread from the speakers themselves if you are interested!

update: Now it has a responsive bullet list!! Remember to change the rectangle height in the "bullets" master component based on a single line height of the list texts.

update: as well as a relfection Medium article wrote by Elsma Ramirez.
